Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.alva.Element

  • public class Robot
extends Entity
    Creates an instance of robot, and draws the robot facing left or right depening on direction it's moving, and sets and gets values for robot and box interaction
